spec_data.Name: perl-Config-Tiny
spec_data.Description:
Config::Tiny is a Perl module designed for reading and writing .ini
style configuration files. It is designed for simplicity and ease of
use, and thus only supports the most basic operations.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:16:59 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module for reading and writing .ini style configuration files
